results.name: Row sums of (signed) triangle A060821 (Hermite polynomials).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..730
Index entries for sequences related to Hermite polynomials
formula: a(n) = Sum_{m=0..n} A060821(n, m) = H(n, 1), with the Hermite polynomials H(n, x).
a(n) = 2^n * U(-n/2, 1/2, 1), where U is the confluent hypergeometric function. - _Benedict W. J. Irwin_, Oct 17 2017
E.g.f.: Product_{k>=1} ((1 + x^k)/(1 - x^k))^(mu(k)/k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, May 26 2019
mathematica: Table[2^n HypergeometricU[-n/2, 1/2, 1], {n, 0, 23}] (* _Benedict W. J. Irwin_, Oct 17 2017 *)
With[{nmax=50}, CoefficientList[Series[Exp[x*(2-x)], {x,0,nmax}],x]* Range[0, nmax]!] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 08 2018 *)
program: def a(n): return sum(Poly(hermite(n, x), x).all_coeffs()) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 26 2017
(MAGMA) m:=30; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); b:=Coefficients(R!(Exp(x*(2-x)))); [Factorial(n-1)*b[n]: n in [1..m]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 08 2018
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
